bio: Average kid Nathan Adams suffered an average death and is now an average Yo-kai! He makes all whom he Inspirits... average!

soultimate.name: Mediocre Boy's Aura
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops all foes' stats by 25% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All foes' stats become average for a time.

skill.effect: Returns to normal 10 sec. after being In Danger.
skill.name: Average

name: Fuu 2
